definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The xylem of ferns only contains tracheids.
sentences.chinese: 蕨類植物的木質部只含有管胞。

sentences.english: A system confined to the transport of mineral elements is known as the xylem .
sentences.chinese: 專門用來運輸礦物元素的系統稱爲木質部。

sentences.english: The study on the stem secondary xylem of Lonicera maximowiczii, reveals the wood belongs to ring porous wood.
sentences.chinese: 研究紫枝忍冬莖次生木質部結構，其爲環孔材。

sentences.english: Tree rings are made of tissue called xylem.
sentences.chinese: 構成年輪的組織被稱爲木質部。

sentences.english: In this paper, the transport characteristics of the nitrogenous com-pounds in the xylem sap of soybean plant were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了大豆植株木質部汁液中氮素運輸特徵。

sentences.english: In the transection section, the area of secondary phloem is much larger than secondary xylem.
sentences.chinese: 在橫切面上，次生韌皮部的面積比次生木質部大得多。

sentences.english: Variation potential(V. P. ) transmission in the xylem of willow plantlet was recorded using outside cell electrode records.
sentences.chinese: 用胞外電極記錄了柳莖木質部中的變異電波傳遞。

sentences.english: Annular thickening Rings of thickening laid down on the inner wall of protoxylem vessels and tracheids .
sentences.chinese: 原生木質部導管和管胞的內層環狀増厚。

sentences.english: The content of psoralen in the cortex was higher than that in the xylem.
sentences.chinese: 根皮中補骨脂素的含量高於木質部。

sentences.english: The study on the stem secondary xylem of Symplocos paniculata, reveals the wood belongs to diffuse-porous wood.
sentences.chinese: 研究白檀莖次生木質部結構研究，其爲散孔材。

sentences.english: The xylem of ferns and conifers contains only tracheids.
Evolutionary trends in secondary xylem of gymnosperms.
sentences.chinese: 裸子植物次生木質部的進化趨勢。
